chunk_metadata.created_by: Enhanced Markdown Chunker with Comprehensive Context

works.Name: Concentus brevis
works.Notes: for oboe and string orchestra; suitable for good school or amateur orchestras; cheerful melodies in outer movements, calm dreaming mood in middle movement
works.Long Description: Concentus (lat.) means harmony, harmonic agreement. In the first and third movements cheerful oboe and string melodies flow together and blend. The calm Andante in between is associated with dreams and a peaceful mood.
works.Short Description: Three-movement concertante work for oboe and strings

works.Name: The Beautiful Days of Aranjuez
works.Notes: for solo harp and string orchestra (2.2.2.2.1) or orchestra; Spanish-flavoured, improvisatory style with intricate lyrical harp cadenza
works.Long Description: Concert piece in rather improvisatory style, Spanish in flavour. Moods change from the pastoral and wistfully nostalgic to the sombre and agitated. Features an intricate lyrical harp cadenza.
works.Short Description: Improvisatory Spanish-style concert piece for harp and strings

works.Name: Tre Momenti
works.Notes: for violoncello and string orchestra; three movements: Speranze – Solitudine – Allegrezze; shows deep knowledge of the cello
works.Long Description: The cello reveals the composer’s sound knowledge of the solo instrument, already evident in the beautiful, tightly-composed theme of the first movement. A rarity that flatters the ear and makes listeners sit up.
works.Short Description: Three-movement work for cello and strings

works.Name: Lyric Fantasy
works.Notes: for piano and string orchestra; two contrasting yet unified movements; melodies shared among instruments
works.Long Description: Two contrasting, yet unified, movements linked by the intertwining of thematic material. Each of the stringed instruments share the melodies as well as providing the underlying textures and rhythmic interest.
works.Short Description: Two-movement concertante work for piano and strings

works.Name: Rhapsodie pour Alto et Orchestre à cordes op. 75
works.Notes: for viola and string orchestra; commissioned by Sanary sur Mer Festival; two movements: Quasi cadenza – Vif; ends in luminous, joyful atmosphere
works.Long Description: The rhapsody is a commissioned work by the Sanary sur Mer Festival in two movements. It begins with an instrumental cadenza on the viola, then the main theme is presented by the string orchestra. The second movement adopts rondo form, is dynamic and colored by pizzicato of the orchestra. The work concludes in a luminous and joyful atmosphere.
works.Short Description: Two-movement rhapsody for viola and strings

works.Name: Mágica y Misteriosa Buenos Aires
works.Notes: Concerto for harp and string orchestra; three movements; depicts chaos of Buenos Aires microcenter through tango influences and Piazzolla-like sounds
works.Long Description: The concert sensitively shows the audience the chaos of the Buenos Aires microcenter through tango influences with typical Piazzolian sounds. It is a very melodic work – a bit like music from a romantic Hollywood film.
works.Short Description: Three-movement harp concerto evoking Buenos Aires

works.Name: Luces y sombras
works.Notes: Concierto para guitarra y orquesta de cuerdas; three movements: Decidido – Molto Espressivo – Risoluto Espressivo; Latin Grammy 2018 Best Contemporary Classical Composition
works.Long Description: Claudia Montero’s music sounds deeply Argentinian. "Light and Shadow" shows a sweeping excursion on the guitar, searching for beauty that is simultaneously tense and quiet; very emotional with special expressiveness, melancholic. Awarded Latin Grammy 2018 Best Contemporary Classical Composition.
works.Short Description: Three-movement guitar concerto awarded Latin Grammy

works.Name: Concierto para violín y orquesta de cuerdas
works.Notes: for violin and string orchestra; three movements: En la esquina rosada – La luna de enfrente – Laberinto; Latin Grammy 2014 Best Classical Contemporary Composition
works.Long Description: A fantasy that creates a sonic universe that touches the soul of Argentina. Awarded Latin Grammy 2014 Best Classical Contemporary Composition.
works.Short Description: Three-movement violin concerto awarded Latin Grammy

works.Name: Concer Tina op. 6
works.Notes: Concertino in three movements for double-bass and string orchestra; explores dark sound of 5-string double bass; Spanish-dance finale
works.Long Description: The three-movement work captures the dark sound of a five-string double bass in normal orchestral tuning. After a free movement inspired by sonata form follows a sort of passacaglia; the third movement recalls a Spanish dance.
works.Short Description: Three-movement concertino for double bass and strings

chunk_info.processing_notes: All nine works listed under "SOLO-INSTRUMENT(E) MIT KLEINEM ORCHESTER" section extracted; each entry provides composer, title, instrumentation, duration, publisher codes and descriptive text.
